data.comment: The match is underway in Toronto.
In Toronto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Throw-in for Toronto at BMO Field.
Throw-in for Vancouver close to the penalty box.
In the minute 3, Tosaint Ricketts for Vancouver gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Toronto at BMO Field.
At BMO Field, Toronto are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 5, Free kick Toronto.
Throw-in Toronto.
In Toronto Toronto attack through Jonathan Osorio. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 8, Vancouver have a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
In the minute 12, Auro of Toronto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal! Toronto have got their heads in front thanks to a Richie Laryea strike.
Great play from Alejandro Pozuelo to set up the goal.
In the minute 16, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver.
Toronto pushes forward through Pablo Piatti, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Lucas Cavallini (Vancouver) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the home team in Toronto.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Toronto push forward at BMO Field and Jonathan Osorio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vancouver defence.
In the minute 25, In Toronto Toronto's Jozy Altidore is caught offside.
Toronto drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 27, Vancouver needs to be cautious. Toronto have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Toronto in Toronto.
Silviu Petrescu awards Vancouver a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Vancouver.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jonathan Osorio of Toronto gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 35, Silviu Petrescu awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 36, Toronto's Liam Fraser has been booked in Toronto.
In Toronto Vancouver drive forward through Jake Nerwinski. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Vancouver's Ali Adnan breaks free at BMO Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 41, Toronto have a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Toronto.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Toronto.
Silviu Petrescu signals a Vancouver throw-in in Toronto's half.
Patrick Mullins is replacing Jozy Altidore for the home team.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Vancouver at BMO Field.
Toronto will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Vancouver.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Toronto's Auro gets in a shot on goal at BMO Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 55, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Andy Rose (Vancouver) has received a yellow card from Silviu Petrescu.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Toronto.
In the minute 57, Toronto make their second substitution with Marky Delgado replacing Liam Fraser.
In Toronto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Toronto to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Toronto, Toronto push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vancouver's Ali Adnan looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 62, Silviu Petrescu waits before resuming play because Ali Adnan for Vancouver is still down.
Toronto's Patrick Mullins gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Vancouver at BMO Field.
Free kick Toronto.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Vancouver.
In the minute 66, Toronto drives forward and Pablo Piatti gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Toronto are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 67, The home team have replaced Richie Laryea with Justin Morrow. This is the third substitution made today by Greg Vanney.
Vancouver are caught offside.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Ryan Raposo is on a sub for Leonard Owusu for Vancouver.
The away team replace Jake Nerwinski with Cristian Dajome.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Toronto.
Justin Morrow's header is off-target for Toronto.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Vancouver make their third substitution with David Milinkovic replacing Tosaint Ricketts.
Throw-in Toronto.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 80, Silviu Petrescu signals a Toronto throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Vancouver defence as Jonathan Osorio fires in a strike for Toronto.
In the minute 82, Toronto's Marky Delgado is on target but unsuccessful.
Nick DeLeon is on a sub for Jonathan Osorio for Toronto.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In the minute 84, Pablo Piatti is booked for the home team.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 85, The home team replace Pablo Piatti with Laurent Ciman.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Free kick Vancouver.
In the minute 86, Alejandro Pozuelo (Toronto) gets a yellow card.
Ali Adnan (Vancouver) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toronto.
In the minute 88, Theo Bair is replacing Ranko Veselinovic for the away team.
Toronto's Alejandro Pozuelo is on target but unsuccessful.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Vancouver at BMO Field.
Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
